title: Home Of Franklin D Roosevelt National Historic Site: Teacher Workshops
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Professional Development     Teacher Workshops                Teacher Workshops         Teaching the Hudson Valley 2012 Institute NPS  2013 THV Institute: Place-Based Learning & Common Core July 30th - August 1st  This year's institute is being designed to show how place-based learning can help you negotiate Common Core without sacrificing your focus on students and community. Whether you work in a school or a less formal setting such as a park, historic site, or museum this institute will give you something to think about, talk about, and DO!
